item.title: Google Colab notebook - input and output, OpenAI TTS API
item.description: Running OpenAI TTS API in Google Colab The example below runs OpenAI TTS API in a Google Colab notebook. The process involves some input and output: Prompt the user for API key Run the API method Save result into a file I have a notebook with two cells. First: Setup cell # @title Notebook Setup # @markdown Please, run this cell first. You'll be prompted for your OpenAI API Keys. # @markdown https://platform.
